sentences.en: Air space Airspace in northern France was closed until monday Monday morning.
sentences.cn: 法国北部的空中飞行直到周一早晨才能恢复.

sentences.en: Air space Airspace in northern France was closed until Monday morning.
sentences.cn: 法国北部的航线知道周一早上才恢复.

sentences.en: Airspace remained largely closed in the Netherlands and Germany.
sentences.cn: 德国与荷兰大半航空继续关闭.

sentences.en: China's territorial land, inland waters, territorial seas and territorial airspace are inviolable.
sentences.cn: (英译汉)中国的领土 、 内陆水域 、 领海及领空是神圣、不可侵犯的.

sentences.en: Get out of my airspace, General!
sentences.cn: 将军,快从我的领空滚出去!

sentences.en: It's up to Secret Service and the Air Force to protect our airspace!
sentences.cn: 该轮到特勤组和空军来保护我们的领空了!

sentences.en: Its use will complicate Army airspace command control.
sentences.cn: 它的使用将会使陆军的空域指挥与控制化.

sentences.en: Pilot: Flying over Pakistan, altitude 30,000 feet. Approaching Soviet airspace.
sentences.cn: 飞行员: 飞行在巴基斯坦上空, 海拔30000英尺, 接近苏联领空.

sentences.en: The airspace above the venue was designated as a no - fly zone.
sentences.cn: 婚礼举行地点的上空被限定为禁飞区.

sentences.en: The glider was in Dutch airspace.
The jet entered Chinese airspace without permission.
sentences.cn: 那架喷气式飞机未经允许闯入中国领空。

sentences.en: The plane was refused permission to enter Chinese airspace.
sentences.cn: 这辆飞机不允许进入中国领空.

sentences.en: They went to war over the violation of their airspace.
sentences.cn: 他们因领空受到侵犯而发生了战争.

sentences.en: You said they couldn't violate their airspace.
sentences.cn: 你说,他们是不能飞越他们的领空的.

trans.tran_en: the sky above a particular country, that is legally controlled by that country
